table.name: Bounties
table.caption: Bounty Target
rows: Tyjan Rames, Wanted Dead or Alive: Accidentally massacred a town
Artina Skil, Wanted Dead or Alive: Scammed a man out of his horse
Andi Crist, Wanted Dead: Suspected of being a demon lord
Plok Un, Wanted Dead: Known enemy of the people
Bron the Dull, Wanted Alive: Accidentally executed the wrong prisoner
Tabitha Poth, Wanted Dead: Cheated on each of her three husbands
Lany Bell, Wanted Alive: Stole an artifact from the local museum
Raiz Flen, Wanted Dead or Alive: Stole a pig
Denmar the Stubborn, Wanted Dead: Refused to pay for damages he inflicted upon the furniture of a local tavern
Wirl Igo, Wanted Alive: Winner of a hide and seek game that took place three years ago
Haijira the Horrid, Wanted Dead: Cast a curse on multiple passersby
Helga Hellgiver, Wanted Dead: Gave hell to the wrong person
Isabella the Mad, Wanted Alive: Ran away from her caretakers
Urz Gro'Kash, Wanted Dead or Alive: Killed a nobleman's son
Brent Borin, Wanted Dead: His trained attack dogs killed a nobleman's son
Toldo, Wanted Dead: Saw something he shouldn't have
Fargarth Stonefrost, Wanted Alive: Knows the secret recipe to an ancient Dwarven mead
Harge Om'kul, Wanted Alive: Kidnapped a woman
Valeria Bene, Wanted Alive: Killed her husband
Patty Barnim, Wanted Dead: The soup was cold
Gary, Wanted Dead: He deserves it
Elsa Gravefiller, Wanted Dead: Killed seventy-six people
Frela the Defamer, Wanted Dead: Exposed a nobleman's scandal
Bolin Frostbeard, Wanted Dead: Poisoned the drinks in a tavern, killing eight people
Mel the Marvelous, Wanted Alive: Persuaded 12 children to run away from home and join his traveling show
Amalia Valentine, Wanted Alive: Stole a man's most prized possession
Dhat Mavids, Wanted Alive: Took an ancient spoon from the local museum
Hal the Scoundrel, Wanted Alive: Owes money to a local leader
Wesk Porington, Wanted Dead: Suspected of being a doppelganger
Ahaji Sanvil, Wanted Dead or Alive: Set fire to a tavern
Indigo Callan, Wanted Dead or Alive: Robbed a trade caravan
Mica Hoodwort, Wanted Dead: Refuses to sell her property to make way for the royal road
Xander Collins, Wanted Dead or Alive: Stole all the loot while a group was fighting a dungeon boss
Larry Lars, Wanted Alive: Didn't pay for his drinks at the tavern
Orpin Jero, Wanted Alive: A troublesome vigilante who comes out at night and beats thugs to a pulp
Alina Lovei, Wanted Alive: Has been missing for thirteen years
Penny the Intelligent, Wanted Dead: Has been terrorizing children with elaborate pranks for 27 years
Gerult Bronzebeard, Wanted Dead: Offended a noblewoman
Kilroy Scarhead, Wanted Dead or Alive: Actually killed a man named Roy
Signid the Immovable, Wanted Dead: Has been loitering in front of the mayors estate for two years, refusing to leave
Lam Pam Tam Wam, the Ham, Wanted Alive: Identity theft
Reid Lightfoot, Wanted Dead: Assassinated an elven dignitary
Penelope Paige, Wanted Alive: Is suspected to have murdered her husband
Jilqa Dro'buln, Wanted Dead: Supposed to be dead already, I want to make sure
Gri Nech the Thief, Wanted Dead: Stole a tree
Zherk Bronzeaxe, Wanted Dead: Went on a killing spree for fun, forty-three dead
Faria Galen, Wanted Alive: Please Faria just give me a chance
Flint Gobbywock, Wanted Alive: Sold a defective lute to a nobleman
Helvig Hammerstring, Wanted Dead: Dishonored his family by becoming a doctor
Grifert the Wort, Wanted Dead: Insulted a nobleman's daughter
Klein the Shady, Wanted Alive: Suspected of selling illegal merchandise
Arvil the Worn, Wanted Dead: I'm just so tired...
Gorn Grin'frolk, Wanted Dead: He ate my last sandwich
Corina Pont, Wanted Alive: Please come home Corina, we miss you
Fallon Steelhammer, Wanted Dead: Stole a royal jewel
Seigfreid Voss, Wanted Alive: Unpaid debt to the town mayor
Borck, Wanted Dead: Borck bad need killed
Barila Bando, Wanted Dead or Alive: Scammed a nobleman
Golgin the Indecipherable, Wanted Alive: He's up to something, I just know it
Deroln Ironstout, Wanted Dead: Running an illegal gambling club
Calnim Farstrider, Wanted Alive: Trespassed on the wrong property
Hajen Jelifin, Wanted Dead or Alive: Stole a horse
Kalico Maven, Wanted Dead: Harbored a known criminal
Gelas Canico, Wanted Alive: Ran away from home for the seventh time
Baugh Rode, Wanted Dead: Wrong place, wrong time
Jack Parvin, Wanted Dead and Alive: Known vampire lord
Belf Agn'nhub, Wanted Dead: Stole a keg of dwarven mead
Onali Rumn, Wanted Dead: Built a wall on property he didn't own
Vin Doss, Wanted Dead: Stole an apple
Sven Highforge, Wanted Dead or Alive: Minor treason
Ralf Grimmel, Wanted Dead: Blackmailed a noble
Ward Walker, Wanted Alive: Kidnapped four halflings
Rufus Padfoot, Wanted Dead: Forged the deed to a nobleman's estate and having said nobleman arrested for squatting
Ammlin Greybeard, Wanted Alive: Losing his mind, wandered away from home
Klav the Fragrant, Wanted Dead: He really does smell THAT bad
Bilfer Boffin, Wanted Dead: Caused a house to collapse, killing five people
Sabina Fyn, Wanted Dead: Seduced and robbed fourteen men
Quirn the Unimportant, Wanted Dead: Just take care of him, no one will miss him
Galia Hevoro, Wanted Alive: Stole a nobleman's housecat
Man Person, Wanted Dead: Man do bad thing
Clive the Clever, Wanted Alive: Tricked a group of adventurers into killing his enemies for him
Eleanora the Unpronounceable, Wanted Alive: Stole a sweet roll from an elf child
Grilb Orbulg, Wanted Dead: Hunts people for fun
Tiki Fortuin, Wanted Alive: Was not at his post when his compound was completely destroyed
Grunth Or'Kilb, Wanted Dead: Killed and ate every animal on a nearby farm
Melon Usk, Wanted Dead: Knows too much
Emeri the Loud, Wanted Dead: Annoyed the wrong people
Barl Hel'Grub, Wanted Alive: Ran away from an arranged marriage
Poc the Wise, Wanted Dead: Gave incredibly bad advice that caused the deaths of four people
Ek Kul'n, Wanted Alive: Stole an elder dragon egg
Griselda Prune, Wanted Dead or Alive: Caused a tribal war
Blint Barefoot, Wanted Dead or Alive: Escaped an inescapable prison
Felina Dais, Wanted Dead or Alive: She humiliated me!!!
Dali Fonti, Wanted Alive: Known user of black magic
Mik the Desserter, Wanted Alive: Stole all the recipes from the bakery where he worked and left town
Puln Brinder, Wanted Dead: Performed unspeakable scientific experiments on runaway children
Arqa Sam, Wanted Alive: I just want to make sure he's alive
Javin Harimer, Wanted Dead: Stole the wrong woman's heart
Hugh Jharms Wanted Dead: Stole a loaf of bread

table.name: Rumors and Odd Jobs
table.caption: Rumor
rows: There's talk that gold has been discovered in the hills beyond the old forest.
A local herb shop is paying for rare specimens.
A group of vampires is moving this way. Well, that's what that wild-eyed man said last night at the inn. Who's ever heard of such nonsense?
A horse was stolen out of the stable last night. The stable boy was hit on the head and knocked out
On the night of a full moon, if you hear a robin's call and toss a silver coin into the town's well, your wish will be granted.
A pickpocket is working in the upscale district.
A circus is supposed to be coming to town in a couple of days.
Three teens set out from town a week ago after buying rope and some rations. Now, their parents are offering a reward to anyone who can bring them back.
The Lord Mayor is hiring adventurers to look into reports of goblin activity around the ruins in the high forest.
A farmer outside of town is said to have a chicken that lays golden eggs.
Slavers raided a village in the hills a week ago. The mayor was afraid to send a party to investigate.
There are whispers of a rebellion against the town leadership. Could new leadership be any worse?
A drunk broke some tables in the inn the other night. He shouted he would teach town a lesson. No one has seen him since.
A body was found dead near the edge of town. His pack included a map.
The owner of the inn is looking to sell.
A group of newcomers is gathering at a local common house for “meetings” one night a week. Well, that's what is being said anyway.
An elf is buying a lot of books around the city.
The town down the road discovered a vast sum of treasure.
Farmer Beullo found thousands of dead birds in his field a few days ago.
A wealthy halfling merchant is supposedly outfitting an ocean expedition.
No one has seen the owner of the old mansion on the hill in more than two years.
A local merchant is offering a reward to anyone who brings back artifacts from the ruins up in the hills.
A musclebound dwarf is offering a large sum of gold to anyone who can best him in a series of feats of strength.
There's talk that the fire at the mill the other night was set by a drifter. The mayor wants to question him.
Several children found a basket that was sealed with tar floating down the river. They say there was a baby inside.
Travelers are telling stories about ruins uncovered in the wilderness about a three-day journey from the city.
The thieves' guild is going to overthrow the town government. Well, that's what a disgraced politician has been saying.
A stranger has been offering payment for information on the strength of the town guard.
Three different people say the spirit of an elf princess appeared to them near the town square in the last week.
Travelers coming down river say blight is spreading among scattered farms.
The shopkeeper at the general store said old Riston didn't come into town for supplies this week.
A mercenary troop is recruiting. Food and wages are offered, but the main benefit is a life of war.
The old man who lives in the cave on the hill has been hiring workers lately.
A drunken guardsman said an ancient scroll was found in the town square.
Several fishermen reported seeing a glow underwater the last few nights. Those old fools are probably drinking again.
A store burned down last week. Whispers say a rival merchant paid the arsonist.
If you stare into the eyes of the inn's cat too long, it will steal your soul. That's what happened to the poor kitchen hand who went mad.
A band of rangers has been gathering at the inn every night this week. Their number is growing and commonfolk are starting to worry.
A nearby fountain was found filled with blood this morning.
Strange cloud formations have been seen over one mountain to the west.
A young farm girl said she saw a dragon flying to the east three days ago.
Wreckage of a raft was found floating downriver by some folk doing laundry. They say there was a logbook.
A reward is being offered for the capture of some vandals.
Several disappearances were noticed after a strange ship left port the other night. Just talk, no one important is missing.
A lost child was found with a spellbook. The authorities are investigating.
The king's son is planning to overthrow and murder his father.
Several people say they have seen lights up at the old mine the last few nights.
A miracle worker is said to be traveling from town to town. If the stories are true, he will arrive here tomorrow.
The old lady who lives outside of town is a witch and she has been placing curses on people. Some folks want to drive her out.
A nomadic band is kidnapping children as they move from town to town. If they show up here, what will we do?
A traveling troupe is looking for players. Untold fame and riches await those who join. They haven't had many takers yet.
The mayor is thinking about canceling the festival, because of so many thieves in the city.
A new businesswoman in town is hiring workers to clear a section of woods near the edge of town.
The town's tinker has created a means of mechanical flight. That old fool couldn't create anything.
A strange bard passed through town recently. After he was gone jewels and valuables were reported missing.
A 12-year-old murdered his father the other night. He's being held at the jail, though he denies he did it with much weeping.
A dwarf named, Randarr, is hiring hands for a journey into the mountains.
There's talk of a woman looking for her lost daughter.
Highwaymen are working the north road. No one has really seen them, but no one wants to go that way now.
One of the town guards said some children found a bundle of gold pieces in the river.
A burglar has been working in the wealthy section of town. Always enters in the second story and only takes gems.
A robber baron is collecting "tolls" from travelers along the east road.
A rich dwarf is hiring hands to help import stone from a dwarven stronghold.
A statue of a god was stolen from the city square two nights ago. Strange how no one saw anything.
An outlying farm was raided a few days ago. The farmer says it was goblins, of course, that can't be.
A band of mercenaries swept into town about a week ago broke a lot of things, spent lots of money, and then moved out yesterday.
Some say they have seen a man carrying a coffin on his back the last two nights.
There has been a string of late-night arsons recently.
That crazy old wizard, Cilivren, is offering 500 gold pieces for a book.
Some dockworkers say dragon scales are washing ashore down at the wharf.
On a nearby mountain top is a man who will give you a stone that will protect you.
The dispute between the metalsmiths and the wood smiths is close to turning violent. Well, at least, that's what that drunken gnome said.
Travelers from the west are telling tales of a wizard building a great library.
There's been a lot of nighttime activity at the general store lately.
The old hermit came into town the other day. He said the old dam upriver is leaking. No one believes him, because he's crazy. That dam hasn't broken in hundreds of years.
One of the servers at the inn is looking to hire on with a group of adventurers.
An expedition that set out a month ago. Their horses found wandering in the forest, but there was no sign of the adventurers.
A man has been coming to the inn the last few nights looking to hire protection.
Some of the farming families on the outskirts of town are saying several gangs of prospectors moved up into the hills recently.
Some say dogs and cats are disappearing around town lately.
Wizards and other magic folk are passing through town. Some “great alignment” is going to happen next month and the best observation spot is to the west.
Krieg was heard arguing with a stranger the other night, now he has disappeared.
That crazy old lady who lives alone by the lake says a monster lives in it.
Wreckage from a ship washed ashore by the docks. There was one badly injured survivor. He's being cared for by the sheriff's family.
Travelers are telling tales of traps set along the south road.
The merchant ship, Cromwell, didn't arrive last month and is thought lost with all hands.
There are stories of a giant red wolf attacking travelers within the last month.
A sea captain is hiring hardy souls for a long voyage.
An art collector has moved into town and is paying for valuable items.
An elven woman has been coming to the inn every night for a week asking about someone named, Gulien.
There are whispers one of the town's wealthy merchants is hiring adventurers and mercenaries.
A businessman is hiring hands to cut timber on the mountain slopes.
Travelers are saying a wizard is building a tower on a hill down the river.
Several local merchants have created an exploration company. They are looking for hardy souls to lead expeditions.
A boisterous band of adventurers left town yesterday. Some say they heard them talking about searching for a legendary library.
A bard is threatening to put the entire town to sleep by playing a magic flute. He's just angry because the town laughed at him while he was performing.
A paladin is recruiting adventurers for a holy quest. He promises adventure, blessings, and almost certain death. Wouldn't that be glorious?
There's a disease in the poor section of town. But, who cares?
The odd dwarf blacksmith is hiring workers to open up a mine. They say it will be incredibly dangerous.
The undertaker has discovered a strange key that is said to open the gates of hell. He's always been a scary fellow anyway.

table.name: Forest Locations
table.caption: Forest Location
rows: Moss-covered wall of a collapsed Stone building
Massive chain drawn tight between two immense stones
Five iron cages hang from a tree, in three of them are dead bodies, in two of them are living prisoners
Fallen hollow tree large enough to walk through
Field filled with lifelike stone statues, terror on their faces
Foundation of stone of a once stout home
Stone spiral staircase leading down into the earth
In between the large knobby roots of a tree lies a crate of longswords
Lean-to against the base of a tree
Ancient road covered with grass and leaves
Cave with a secret cache of liquor
Limestone formations jut from the forest floor mimicking stone trees
Large stone cut into a perfect circle
Secluded grotto where the ghost of an elf princess resides
Pipe sticking out of the ground with clear water gushing out
Treehouse village of small furry bipeds
Hollow tree large enough to camp in
Clear pool with stones around the edges
Hidden grotto with a statue of a woman guarding a clear pool
Lake with a dock and a rowboat
Circular stone about 8' in diameter stained with ancient blood
Forest canopy is so thick that light barely gets through
Sandpit quarry no one seems to be around
Hill completely covered in soft thick moss
Large tree stump serves a table set for tea (exact amount for the number of players)
Ship (there is no sea or water nearby)
Clear stream with a statue lying supine at the bottom.
Swift fl owing creek with a man-made ford
River pouring into a subterranean cavern
Area of the forest is blighted
Inn built into a huge old tree
Stones arranged in the shape of an arrow pointing a different direction than the party should be traveling

table.name: Inn Encounters
table.caption: Inn Encounter
rows: Group of halfl ings begins singing loudly

A rather ugly young maiden bursts into the room yelling in a strange tongue. Shortly after, a beautiful, but fierce maiden of the same age comes in. She spots the first girl and screams something at her in the same language. She pulls out a magical rope and binds her. Dragging the frightened maiden out of the room, she speaks to no one. Meanwhile, the bound girl is obviously pleading for help in her own language.
Sign: "Gnomes, we don't serve your kind."
A bard is performing but one patron is heckling them terribly
Fire breaks out in the common room
Barmaid slips a character a note, it says meet me in the wine cellar
Sign: "Halflings, we don't serve your kind."
Cook shouts, "I quit!" and storms out.
Fight breaks out on the other side of the common room
When the party enters, everyone else leaves
The bard stops playing and runs out the door
Innkeeper announces the inn will close permanently tomorrow
A wizard shouts at the innkeeper, "You'll rue this day!" as he storms out
A woman asks the party if they have seen her daughter
Party is told the gnome in the corner bought them all drinks
Barmaid spills drinks on a nearby table, the patrons begin yelling at her
Sign: "Half-elves, we don't serve your kind."
Party notices a single gold piece under the table

There is a child going about serving tables. She keeps her head down and averts her eyes when others speak to her. Her movements are graceful and there seems to be an element of magic in the small tasks she performs. Around her ankle is a metal band engraved with strange runes.
Innkeeper demands triple the price for everything the party orders

In a dark corner, a man is sitting alone with his face buried in his hands. Before him is a book. When you gaze at the book, it appears blank, but you feel you could just swear there was writing in it when you first saw it out of the corner of your eye.
Party is told the woman in the corner bought them all drinks
Rough-looking dwarf jumps behind the bar and grabs the till
Fire breaks out in the kitchen
A woman asks the party if they would like to buy some "sweet leaf"
A dwarf keeps staring at the party
A man weeps uncontrollably at the bar
A man bursts in raving about a headless horseman chasing him down the road
The party sees a pickpocket lift a man's coin purse
A bard asks the party if they happen to have a lutestring
Fire breaks out in wine cellar
Sign: "Humans, we don't serve your kind."
Innkeeper asks for help gathering firewood
Heated argument at the table next to the party
Patron bumps into one character and then warns them to watch their step
When the party pays, the innkeeper says he can't take money from you folks
Patron asks the party for a gold piece

A small boy is moving through the crowd, performing magic tricks for a few coins. He has an easy-going, likable manner, and the customers find themselves disposed to indulge him. However, you notice as he moseys about the room, his fingers seem to fi nd the wallets of the preoccupied patrons.
A frightened horse crashes through the common room
Stable boy runs in and says someone is stealing the horses
Party finds a child hiding under their table
The innkeeper puts a bottle of wine on the party's table and says this one's on the house and leaves with a wink
As a character sits down, they notice a bundle of letters in the chair
A headless chicken runs through the common room and then collapses
A rock flies through a window, shattering it. There is a note tied to it.

There is a group of formidable-looking women playing cards. One of them keeps eyeing your party. If she catches the party's eye, she grins impishly. She continues to raise the stakes of the game, much to the annoyance of her companions.
Barmaid drops a tray of drinks on the player's table creating a huge mess
An elf keeps staring at the party
Fight breaks out next to the party
A man in pied attire saunters into the room and announces the upcoming dance competition. He assures the customers that the prizes and honor bestowed will be second to none.
Raucous game of darts involving most in the common room
All patrons stare at the party
Common room erupts into a huge brawl
Sign: "Dwarves, we don't serve your kind."
Huge rough-looking human announces, "Every bard in here needs to leave now."
A woman with a strange hat is approaching every table and asking if they are adventurers for hire
Gang demands protection money from the innkeeper

There's a man dressed in hunter's garb apparently sleeping at his table. In his hand is a strange jewel. Many of the people around the tavern seem to know who he is. Whispering to each other, you hear snippets of conversation concerning the precious stone. Rumors of it being magical, or evil, or both waft across the room. Suddenly and silently the jewel slips from the hunter's grasp and clatters upon the flagstones.
Party is told the dwarf in the corner bought them all drinks
Party is told the elf in the corner bought them all drinks
Innkeeper and patron get into a heated argument
Patron hands the party a sealed letter and says to keep it safe
Several loud crashes shake the inn, they came from the kitchen
A halfling seems to be having trouble lighting his pipe

A young lady in a flamboyant costume is speaking to a mysterious pale-skinned man. She is offering up her unique services for a price. Claiming that she has the ability to hypnotize crowds with her soothing voice and magic-infused mandolin, she makes suggestions that the crowd finds difficult to refuse.
A man bursts in and demands if anyone has seen a person matching this description. He describes one party member to a tee.
Eight angry gnomes enter and appear to be looking for someone
Guards come in and announce that the mayor has ordered the inn closed
A strange, tiny man is going around peeking in everyone's shoes. He seems to be looking for something of dire importance.
Sign: "Half-orcs, we don't serve your kind."
A drunk father brags about his smoking hot fairy wife who gave him a daughter that can spin straw into gold
A troupe is performing a play
A fabulously wealthy (but hammered) man gets his hand stuck in a wine barrel

There is an ancient woman sitting by the fire, muttering. She has a strange shard of ice in her hand, which she is shaving with a knife. As she shears off the ice, the shard becomes sharper and sharper. The shavings fall into the fire, creating mysterious bursts of colorful flames as they fall in.
Fire breaks out in a guest room
Party is told the man in the corner bought them all drinks
A wizard is sitting at the bar. He is in a heated discussion with a tiny, wispy fairy perched upon the brow of his hat. The fairy appears to have a crumpled wing.
A finely dressed elf asks if anyone is interested in a game of cards
Innkeeper asks the party to deliver a package
Drunk man passes out on the party's table.
Sign: "Elves, we don't serve your kind."
Bare-knuckle fights are being held in the common room
The party notices a dirty child stealing bread
Seemingly drunk patron slips a map into one character's hand
Two patrons draw swords and face each other

table.name: Jobs
table.caption: Job
rows: Help an old lady across the street
Help a young page find his sword before the tournament
Explore a ruin for a noble family
Provide security for a noble's party
Deliver medicine to an ill person
Escort a prisoner from one town to another
Impersonate a noble at a party
Scout an orc camp for the queen
Map a forest for a noble
Help an innkeeper get a beehive out of the stables
Help teach a teenager to fight
Rescue prisoners being held in a goblin lair
Investigate a murder for the town council
Guard the walls of the town overnight
Dig a ditch for the mayor
Deliver a package to the hermit of the hills
Help a merchant who is being hassled by gangsters
Clean a temple for the priest
Transport a dragon egg to an elven queen
Kill the rats in a warehouse
Help a noble find a lost key
Transport a chest to a dwarven stronghold
Return a ring to a noble family
Join an expedition to a lost city
Get a cat out of a tree
Find the fountain of youth for a wealthy old man
Protect a witness until the trial
Deliver a letter to the mayor of another town
Lend a hand in the mines
Investigate a strange door unearthed outside of town
Fix a wagon for a widow
Clear land for crops for a farmer
Find the thief who stole the king's signet ring
Transport goods for a merchant to another town
Break up a gang of bootleggers
Investigate the sounds coming from the graveyard
Deliver a sword to a knight
Investigate strange tracks by the lake
Find a rare herb for an herbalist
Locate a runaway prince and return him to the queen
Investigate the burning of a farmhouse
Help a general store with its grand opening
Secretly deliver a message to a prisoner
Provide entertainment at the princess's birthday party
Deliver an ancient book to a wizard
Represent a noble in an archery contest
Help the king's mare give birth
Explore the ruins under the old sawmill
Locate a lost gemstone for a merchant
Bring a white stag to the king
Carry a message to another kingdom
Go to the underworld and bring someone back from the dead
Infiltrate the thieves' guild and pass information to the mayor
Take care of horses at the stables
Help a troubled spirit find peace
Investigate a field of dead birds
Help peasants do a controlled field burning
Search the old city ruins for an artifact
Find a rare book for a librarian
Investigate why the town's main water source dried up
Help out at the local quarry
Deliver a ring to a certain gnome inventor
Investigate odd sightings in the tunnels under the town
Help a farmer fight off a gang trying to steal his land
Play matchmaker for two rival innkeepers
Escort a princess to her wedding
Load cargo on a ship for a sea captain

table.name: Jungle Encounters
table.caption: Jungle Encounter
rows: Ax stuck in a large tree that appears to be bleeding
Tribal warriors trying to communicate in a foreign language
Skulls on the tip of spears
Flowers with intoxicating pollen in the air
Cave with a lit fire inside
Ghostly figure of someone a character loves
Meat roasting over a fi re
Flying snake with a message tied to it
Wagon filled with an ivory shipment
Pair of boots hanging from a vine
Parrot that follows the part and mocks them
Circle of druids performing a ritual
Halfling hanging upside down from a trap
Glowing mushrooms covering the trees nearby
Shed skin of a huge snake
Young boy who acts like an ape
Bounty hunter looking for an escaped convict
Small ship in the top of a tree
Beautiful tribal woman being attacked by her own tribe
Staff entangled in vines high in the canopy
Young orc barbarian looking to prove his strength
Shadow of a roc flying over
Wizard trying to protect the trees
Wooden knight standing in the path
Scientist researching for a new book
Man who frantically shouts for the party to run for their lives
Bow and arrows hidden in a hollow tree
Secret order of monks protecting a holy site
Cave opening to an underground lake
Golden statuette of a monkey with ruby eyes
Friendly goblin offering to feed you at his home

table.name: Mountain Encounters
table.caption: Mountain Encounter
rows: Dead pack mule (still loaded with supplies)
Unconscious knight lying inside stone circle
Nervous dwarf who says he's traveling
Cage hanging from a tree filled with ravens
Halfling caught in a bear trap

table.name: Non-Combat Encounters
table.caption: Non-Combat Encounter
rows: Family traveling to a new town
Odd symbol etched into the ground
Group of dwarves carrying a large stone
Elf hands one character a book then runs off
Tinker with a wagon selling wares
Woman gives one character a ring then dies
Worker cutting grass with a sickle
Young boy looking for a sword
Wanted poster nailed to a tree
Child carrying a large bundle of straw
Old beggar asks for a coin
Gallows with a body swaying in the breeze
Group of monks on a pilgrimage (1D12)
Child is lost in a cave
Book hanging from a tree by a leather cord
Courier's bag open with letters scattered about
Large rectangular stone lies in the path
Golden arrow stuck in a tree
Man hanging upside down from a tree
Sad bard sitting on a stump
Rock seemly rolling under its own power
Orphan steals something from a character
Overturned wagon with fruit scattered about
Child has fallen into a well
Warrior searching for his lost sister
Pair of boots with bloodstains nearby
Dog runs up to be petted
Golden book lies on the ground
Bear caught in a bear trap
Dead horse with riding gear scattered about
Loaded pack mule with no owner to be seen
Arrow with a note stuck into a tree
Farmer looking for a lost cow
Two hand axes stuck into the ground

table.name: Notes in a Bottle
table.caption: Note in a Bottle
rows: Deed to a castle and a town in a nearby country
Appears blank but has a magically hidden message
"The end is near and maybe my letter will find someone who cares..."
"Whoever opened this bottle is now king." (details included)
Navigation chart to an island rich in spices
Letter revealing the location of a dragon hoard (written in draconic)
Wanted poster of a character in the party
Map that leads to a faraway town
Letter discussing a quarry of rare stone (written in dwarven)
Tale of a lady who lost her mind
Ancient legend about a fox wedding
"We need warriors. Come join us." (from a nearby town)
"In the nearest town, you will find the answers you are seeking."
"I'm lost. My last known location was..." (directions included)
Letter speaking of a large gemstone (written in goblin)
Instructions on how to build a wooden table
"All is lost and I cannot continue."
"Blood will be shed. Tread carefully the path you walk."
Detailed picture and description of a dragon
"I have no reward for the finder of this message save that of friendship." (contact details included)
Last will and testament of a wealthy merchant
Heroic tale from a lost culture
Details of a lost people group
"A maiden is locked in a tower." (directions included)
Quest to find a buried chest full of gold
Love letter dated more than a thousand years ago
"The secret to life is found within yourself but the secret to yourself is found in life."
Map to a dungeon in a faraway land
Once the piece of paper is touched it melts
"Whoever answers this letter with aid can have my crown..." (details included)
Legal contract on black paper with white letters
"I am a prince. I have been kidnapped. If you were to rescue me, the reward would be..." (directions included)
Letter discussing hidden loot (written in thieves' cant)
"This bottle is very valuable. Don't break it!"
"The goddess of disease and poison shall curse you."
Story of a man named Krimdar, he came from afar...
"You are called by the gods to battle the creatures of the underworld."
Letter from a character's family member
Footprint chart of eight different animals
Tale of a man who slew a dragon
Deed to a mill in a nearby city
"The Blue Devil Mercenaries are traitors. Don't trust them!"
Piece of paper with the family crest of a boar
"Find the lost silver mine of Tharen before Ulmek does!"
Recipe for a potion of healing
Detailed drawing of a mythical animal
Blank piece of paper that bursts into flame when opened
List of edible and non-edible berries

table.name: Road Encounters
table.caption: Road Encounter
rows: Statue of a king with a passage at the base
Crude stone arrow pointing off into the woods
Old wanderer (actually a god in disguise)
Bard playing a lute, woodland creatures following
Section of the road washed out
Paladin carrying a barrel yelling, "Make way!"
Strange symbol drawn on the road
Landslide covering a section of the road
Broken down a statue of a beautiful woman
Gold piece lying on the road
Vulures picking a corpse of some kind
Goose nest in the middle of the road
Twelve stones stacked on top of each other
Large mud pit in the road
Man being chased by a woman
Coins scattered all over the road (2D100cp)
Peasant boys throwing apples at travelers
Man with a gigantic book strapped to his back

table.name: Sea-Related Encounters
table.caption: Sea-Related Encounter
rows: Massive sand castle large enough to live in
Ship with black flags in the distance
Small chest with the sound of a beating heart
Small boat with supplies but no sailors
Gold statue of a man holding a trident
Shark carcass with a sword piercing its head
Woman in the water holding a sword
Man in a boat with a goat
Old human wizard walking on the water
Sunken ironclad ship from a lost time
Starfish that suctions to a character
Human who believes he is a merman
Ghost of a man who died at sea
Large tree washed up on the beach
Long scaly tail disappears just out of sight
Oars stuck upright in the sand (1D20)
Tall tower sticking out of the water
Single tree growing out of the water
Wife waiting for her sailor husband
Stone statue of a woman dressed in robes
Old man that gives you a fishing pole
Strange man looking for a lost child
Coastal druid talking to some fish
Water witch looking to make a trade
Young boy froze in an iceberg
Ghostly of a woman in a long flowing dress

table.name: Seafaring Encounters
table.caption: Seafaring Encounter
rows: Bottle with a navigation chart inside
Elves in a hot air balloon (1D6)
Lifeboat (empty except for a pocket watch)
Huge snail resting on a rock
Buoy with a message from a lost ship
Jagged rocks just under the surface
Huge shoal of fish that begin to eat the hull
Flag from a legendary pirate ship

table.name: Swamp Encounters
table.caption: Swamp Encounter
rows: Boulder that turns out to be a turtle
Large chain coming out of the ground
Band of orcs building a wooden tower (2D20)
Elf with a severe head injury
Hand sticking out of the mud
Something large swimming under the water
Man in a cage hanging from a tree
Place where the water is on fire
Still pool lined with gold trinkets

table.name: Talking Inanimate Objects
table.caption: Talking Inanimate Object
rows: Iron bracelet that chats about the weather
Pair of gloves that claims to be a queen
Small polished rock that sings lullabies
Belt buckle that claims to be a wizard
Ring that chats about local celebrities
Lantern that talks about the good old days
Burlap sack that recites love poetry
Pipe that claims to be a halfling
Bronze coin that talks like a goblin
Iron chest that tells the story of the fall of an empire
Cloak that claims she's a princess
Gold necklace that compliments the wearer
Brass button that talks like an orc
Block of wood that wants to be useful
Fork tell stories of heroic deeds
Wood file that claims to be a carpenter
Hammer that claims to be a blacksmith
Iron bracelet that claims to have secret knowledge
Longsword that tries to pick a fight with everyone
Arm ring that claims to be a merchant
Large rock that mourns a lost loved one
Bar of soap that swears like a sailor
Broom that wishes to be useful
Spoon that claims to be an old woman
Walking stick that claims to be a sorcerer
Pouch that claims to be a half-elf
Chain that claims to be a dwarf
Metal hook that clucks like a chicken
Quill that critiques the writing it is used to make
Short sword that sings whenever it is drawn
Leather belt the claims to be a king
Wooden club that barks every time it is swung
Bronze ring that asks many questions
Rope that claims to be an elf
Silver ring that sings whenever the moon is out
Pair of boots that complain all the time
Shirt that complains about being out of style
Gold ring that likes to discuss history
Jade statuette that claims to be a great warrior
Dagger that claims he's a prince
Book that reads itself out loud
Book that begs the finder not to read it
Cloak clasp that says it just wants to have friends
Silver bracelet that likes to discuss politics

table.name: Underground Encounters
table.caption: Underground Encounter
rows: Two dwarves carrying an injured elf
Book (roll once on a Book Title Table)
Thousands of eyes peering from the darkness
Massive rope hanging from the ceiling
Cavern filled with billions of tiny spiders
Foul stench from a narrow tunnel
Pack of giant spiders on the hunt
Dwarves transporting a cart of rubies
Emerald ring floating above the ground
Deep scratches on the walls and floor
Tunnel full of sharp chipped stones
Lost adventuring party looking for a way out
Well-kept house and yard in a large cavern
Wooden door in the wall of the cave
Frantic writings etched into the wall of a tunnel
Woman looking for her lost caravan
Human carrying a bag of gems and rare metals
Man driven mad by the darkness
Frightened man running for his life
Bulbous rock-like creature tunneling through stone
Adventurers who are shells of what they once were
Giant spider hiding above a pile of dead bodies
Knight praying at a stone altar
Dwarf looking for precious metals and stones
Mysterious chest in the middle of a large cavern
Light barely visible from a faraway tunnel
Ghost of a small girl looking for her parents
Gnome wizard sculpting a clay golem
Toxic gasses leaking from the walls
Blood leading up the wall and across the ceiling
Distant howls echoing through the deep
Large, seemingly bottomless pit in the floor
Dissonant music coming from a nearby cave
Man who says he's traveling to an underground city
